alert.note: Alert for Ouachita (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 18 at 12:01PM CST until January 18 at 12:30PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM CST FOR CALHOUN...SOUTHEASTERN DALLAS AND SOUTHEASTERN OUACHITA COUNTIES... At 1201 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Highland Industrial Park, or 10 miles east of Camden, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fordyce... Hampton... Bearden... Thornton... Louann... Highland Industrial Park... Ellisville... Harlow... Hampton Municipal Airport... East Camden... Tinsman... Delhi... Chambersville... Frenchport... Cross Roads in Ouachita County... Locust Bayou... Hopeville... Woodberry... Millville... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CST for southeastern and southwestern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
